titleStmt.title: Micro-cynicon. Sixe snarling satyres Insatiat Cron. Prodigall Zodon. Insolent Superbia. Cheating Droone. Ingling Pyander. Wise Innocent.
titleStmt.author: Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Creede, for Thomas Bushell, and are to be sold at his shop at the north doore of Paules Church,

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to Thomas Middleton; the initials T.M. appear on A6r.
The words "Insatiat .. Innocent" are printed in two columns, between brackets on the title page.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A"; the second leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop at the north doore of Paules Church
